Laptops are used to communicate via Mail and Forums while traveling, you may also use the Newspaper.
This can only be bought once, and is needed to use the Raceway
This application can be bought once and downloaded as needed on various PCs, it notifies you of new Events and Mail in real time with a slight delay.
Gas Cans are needed for arson Crimes.
A Display Cabinet can only be bought once and is used to display items on your user profile.
The Bazaar can only be bought once and is used to sell items tax free!
Can be used to buy Merits up to half your current level IE a lvl 50 can buy up to 25 merits.
Resets Merits so you can spend them again. Each reset increases the cost by 250 points with a maximum of cost of 5,000 points and unlimited resets.
pageTitle: Torn City Points - Torncity WIKI - The official help and support guide
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {41480=Donator Packs used to be available for 100 points, this was removed in November 2010.}
textBeforeTable: This is where you spend your points. Here are the following things you can spend points on: Points Building If a player signs up using your referral code (found at the bottom of the city page and on the Recruit Citizens page found on the sidebar) you will be awarded with, among other things, 250 points. Referring players to the game All artifacts as well as complete flower sets and plushie sets can be exchanged in the Museum for points (unlocked after completing the Bachelor of History). The amount of points you can acquire ranges between 5 for a complete plushie set to 10,000 for a single Egyptian amulet. Exchanging artifacts and other collectible sets in the Museum You can submit your comics and articles to the newspaper when level 10. If accepted, a comic will reward 250 points and an article gives 500 points (If you are a regular contributor to the Newspaper then you may receive more points). Submitting to the newspaper Succeeding the 13 nerve pawn shop crime (Side door only) will give 3-7 points. If you choose to do this crime then be warned that if you fail you will lose a large chunk of crime exp. Steal points in the pawn shop Becoming a subscriber will give you 75 points either annually or monthly
textAfterTable: Points Market This is where you buy and sell points. The Points Market has a cap of $100,000 per point. The average price per point on the Points Market is $60,000. Points can also be sold to the Pawn Shop for a calculated price, current $50,000, but cannot be bought there. History Donator Packs used to be available for 100 points, this was removed in November 2010.
